name: ORS HealthCare Data for TPP SystmOne Alternative Version for 4 Tier Housing Locations
description:
This report is based on PDD0027, and is designed for establishments with a 4 Tier Housing Locations. It returns the data required for upload into TPP's SystmOne healthcare system. The report prompts for an establishment code. The report is not formatted for printing.
PDD0027a - v1.0 Last Modified: 02/11/2017*Open the report in Excel, then save as '.csv' format*

dataset.name: Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_NO, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.REQUEST_NAME, to_char(AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'), decode(AT_OFFENDER.SEX_CODE,'M','Male','F','Female','Unknown'), Case When AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE='W8' then 'W3' when AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE='O1' then 'A4' else AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END || '-' || Case when AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE='W8' then 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' when AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE='O1' then 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION END, DT_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_CODE, Case when DT_ENGLISH_SPEAKING.ENGLISH_SPEAKING_FLAG='Y' then 'Yes' Else 'Unknown' END, AT_HEADER_BLOCK.STATUS_DISPLAY||' '||AT_HEADER_BLOCK.IN_OUT_STATUS, decode(instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,1),0,null,substr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,1)+1,decode(instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,2),0,length(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION),instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,2)-instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,1))-1)), decode(instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,2),0,null,substr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,2)+1,decode(instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,3),0,length(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION),instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,3)-instr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,'-',1,2))-1)), substr(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION,length(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID)+2,length(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)), to_char(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_BEGIN_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'), to_char(DT_ADMISSION.ADMISSION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'), TO_CHAR(case when AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE  else null end,'dd/mm/yyyy') FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ETHNICITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, ( SELECT Offender_Book_ID, LANGUAGE_CODE FROM oms_owner.offender_languages WHERE PREFERED_SPEAK_FLAG='Y' ) DT_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE, ( SELECT Offender_Book_ID, 'Y' as English_Speaking_Flag FROM oms_owner.offender_languages WHERE Language_Code='ENG' and speak_skill IN ('Y','A','G','D') ) DT_ENGLISH_SPEAKING, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, ( Select distinct m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, max(m.MOVEMENT_TIME) as ADMISSION_DATE from OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS m, OMS_OWNER.offender_bookings h Where h.booking_status='O' and h.active_flag='Y' and m.direction_code='IN' --AND m.Movement_reason_code !='R' AND m.Movement_type = 'ADM' and m.to_agy_loc_id = h.agy_loc_id and h.offender_book_id=m.offender_book_id group by m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID ) DT_ADMISSION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID=AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID ) AND ( AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DOMAIN(+)='ETHNICITY' ) AND ( AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE(+)=AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE='INST' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME=UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID=USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID ) AND ( AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID ) AND ( AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID=AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID NOT IN ('OUT','TRN') AND AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID NOT IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I','MULTI') ) AND ( AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID=AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID ) AND ( AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID=WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=DT_ENGLISH_SPEAKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=DT_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID(+) ) AND ( USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME=UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) ) AND ( USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME=UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) ) AND ( WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME=UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) ) AND ( WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME=UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) ) AND ( WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME=UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) ) AND ( ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */ ) ) AND ( /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID=(SELECT max(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID=A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */ ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)
